original_text: The one who touches any such thing will be unclean till evening. He must not eat any of the sacred offerings unless he has bathed himself with water.
korean_text: 곧 이런 것에 접촉된 자는 저녁까지 부정하니 그의 몸을 물로 씻지 아니하면 그 성물을 먹지 못할지며

sentences.original_text: The one who touches any such thing
He must not eat any of the sacred offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 제물 중 아무것도 먹어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: unless he has bathed himself with water
